description: Details of wall/fences pursuant to condition 5 of planning permission Ref: 07314/14 for demolition of existing classrooms, and ancillary buildings, and erection of part single and two storey building to provide indoor sports facilities, creche and community health facilities, together with layout of car parking spaces
decision_conditions: Notwithstanding any indication given in the approved drawing, this permission is only for walls and fences and no barrier shall be erected to the approved car park.  REASON:  The condition pursuant to which approval of the details is sought only relates to walls and fences and in the interests of highway safety to accord with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, B5, T63, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 9.11.
